cards.title: Theurgy
powers: Draw a card or play a [u]charm[/u] card. One hero target may regain 1 hp.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Move a card from a trash to the top of its deck.

openingLines.default: I've already seen your defeat through the Tapestry.

cards.title: Clairvoyance
body: Reveal X cards from the top of any deck, where X = the number of [u]charm[/u] cards in play plus 1.
Put them back in any order.

cards.title: Convert the Energy
body: Play this card next to a hero character card.
At the start of their turn, they may select a damage type. Until the start of their next turn, all damage they deal is that type.
That hero gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] Play 1 card or use 1 power. All damage is irreducible until this card leaves play. destroy [i]Convert the Energy[/i].

cards.title: Delight In Discovery
body: Draw X cards, where X = the number of [u]charm[/u] cards in play plus 1.
if {Theurgy} has no [u]charm[/u] cards in her play area, play a card.
cards.flavorText: “Not gonna lie,{BR}that was a f***in' blast!”

cards.title: Eyes On the Hands
body: Whenever you discard a card, you may put it into your hand instead.
if you do, either destroy this card or {Theurgy} deals herself 2 irreducible psychic damage.

cards.title: Focusing Crystal
body: When this card enters play, {Theurgy} regains 2 hp.
The first time a [u]charm[/u] card is destroyed each turn, {Theurgy} regains 1 hp.
powers: {Theurgy} deals 1 target X energy damage, where X = the number of [u]charm[/u] cards in play times 2. Destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “I'm sorry.{BR}I have no clue how it works.”

cards.title: Follow the Path
body: Play this card next to a hero character card.
At the start of that hero's turn, their player may draw a card.
That hero gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 1 in your hand. Put 1 on top of your deck. Play 1. Discard the rest. Destroy [i]Follow the Path[/i].

cards.title: Guide the Strike
body: Play this card next to a hero character card.
increase damage dealt by hero targets in that hero's play area by 1.
That hero gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] this hero deals 1 target 5 melee or projectile damage. Destroy [i]Guide the Strike[/i].

cards.title: I Am a Professional
body: At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck.
You may switch it with one card from your hand or your trash.

cards.title: Legerdemain
body: Put any number of [u]charm[/u] cards back into your hand from play.
You may play up to that many cards now.

cards.title: Sell the Grift
body: Play this card next to a hero character card.
At the start of their turn, they may discard a card. If they do, they may put a card from their trash into their hand.
That hero gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] Discard any number of cards. Move up to that many cards from your trash to your hand. Play 1 card. Destroy [i]Sell the Grift[/i].

cards.title: Teleportation
body: Put a card from the environment trash into play.
Destroy 1 environment card.

cards.title: The Scholar's Journal
body: when this card enters play, draw 2 cards.
When this card is destroyed, select a deck. cards from that deck cannot be played until the start of your next turn. Remove this card from the game.
powers: Destroy a [u]charm[/u] card. Search your trash or deck for a [u]charm[/u] card. Put it into play or in your hand.

cards.title: Trap Door
body: {Theurgy} deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
That target deals up to X targets 2 projectile damage, where X = the number of [u]charm[/u] cards in play plus 1.

cards.title: Weather the Hits
body: Play this card next to a hero character card.
Reduce damage taken by hero targets in that hero's play area by 1.
That hero gains the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] this hero regains 5 hp. All other hero targets regain 1 hp. Destroy [i]Weather the Hits[/i].

cards.title: Yoink!
body: Destroy 1 ongoing or equipment card.
if you destroyed a hero card, that hero's player may put a card from their trash into play.

promoCards.title: Theurgy
powers: choose a target. if they're a hero target, Theurgy deals them 2 psychic damage. if they're a villain target, they regain 2 hp. if they're an environment target, destroy a [u]charm[/u] card. reveal the top card of the target's deck. Either replace it, discard it, or put it into play.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
Reveal the top card of each deck, then replace it. Select a deck and discard its top card.
Select 1 non-indestructible card in play, other than a Character card, and put it on top of its deck.

openingLines.default: I will tear you from the Tapestry.
